title: NumPEx Software Catalog Mapping Schema
description: Specifies how metadata should be extracted from Codemeta or other JSON file for each project.

name.description: Optional project name. If omitted, it must be provided by the extracted fields.

source.description: URL of the CodeMeta or JSON file to harvest.

allow.description: Specifies whether this mapping is allowed to create new projects, update existing ones, or both. Default is 'update'.

mappingRef.description: URL of an external mapping definition file (e.g., standard Codemeta mapping).

additionalProperties.description: A jq expression extracting the corresponding property from the source file.

fields.description: Custom field extraction rules using jq queries.
